name: Poppy Fields*
description:
The California Poppy is the official state flower of California!

I live in Palmdale CA, not far from the California Poppy flower reserve & fields. Every spring  the reserve and surrounding areas are flooded with tourists and locals coming to see the Poppy flowers that have bloomed. Despite the quarantine there are many people still going to the reserve (I'm guilty of this). Therefore, the most memorable part of my quarantine so far is going to see the Poppy flowers! 

This game puts you in a field of Poppy flowers for 10 seconds, as you use the "N" & "S" key to navigate through poetic verses that illustrate what it feels like to be at the Poppy reserve. 

This game puts you in touch with your senses and with mother earth!
